name: (concept) No Saints Go to Heaven
description:
(wip - come back tomorrow when the portraits are all done)

Proof of concept of my darling little world I've put too much thought into. There'd be more, but this is just the opening to experiment with the narrative side. Scenes are shitty sketches because nerve hurt owie. Reboot of a project I made in 2020 and if any of you remember it no you don't 🤍

Also known as "Stan completely ignores the built-in Narrat skill system and does his own thing entirely". Remind me to give Narrat a second go and actually make a disco-lite.

For Narrat Game Jam. Our finite resource being pips.

≥ - greater or equal

≤ - less or equal

Credits

Content Warnings:

  • Discussions of death and suicide
  • Death threats
